root: ^The forest around you unfolds to a path through the trees as you venture deeper into the enchanting realm.
^In the deeper forest the air feels pleasantly colder as the thick canopy of trees doesn’t filter as much light and warmth through to the ground.
^The narrow path weaves through the towering trees, creating an inviting and adventurous route to explore.
^As you slowly navigate the subtle twists and turns of the forest path, you come  across a lone flowerkin, reminiscent of a rose standing confidently by the side of the road.
^The flowerkin exudes the air of confidence, as her looks give a subtle warning of her tough demeanor.
^"And who might you be, adventuring here so deep in the woods?"
^The tough-looking flowerkin locks eyes with you in quite intense stare, with a smirk playing on her lips.

s: ^"Just taking a stroll through this beautiful forest. I couldn’t resist its allure."
^“I thought this was the right way home, but now I might be lost again. Would you be able to help?”

g-0: ^“But of course, darling! I’m Rosa, by the way, the one and only.”
^The contrast of beauty with thorny exterior embodies the enchantment and danger of the forest itself.
^With the bold charisma and assertiveness, touched with the delicate beauty she’s echoing promises of thrilling adventures.

s: ^"I appreciate the confidence. What makes this forest special for you?"
^“Uh, okay. Nice to meet you. What’s your story, Rosa?”

g-1: ^“This forest is my kingdom! I thrive in its wild embrace, and I’m not settling for anything less than extraordinary. What about you, adventurer?”
^The sun briefly filters through the dense leaves, creating a dance of shadows on the moss surrounding the forest path.
^The silence is more predominant deeper in the forest and is equally calming as it is mysterious.

s: ^"I’m just exploring, trying to enjoy the beauty of this forest."

g-1: ^_“Lost my way and I actually need some directions. Are you the queen of this forest?”

c-4: ^“Exploring, huh? You might find this place more captivating than you bargained for.”
c-5: ^“Queen? More like the untamed spirit that keeps this place alive. I’ve been through storms, thunder, the dramatics. And I stood my ground!”
^<i>You are about to enter a mini-game. If you do well, you can score some extra points with this character! Control your bee with WASD.

g-2: ^The forest path transforms into a stage for the captivating encounter with the fearless Rosa, who has tangled with the wildest creatures and come out on top.
^The boldness mixed with ethereal beauty is compelling you to stay, but after a while you decide to move on with your journey.
